name: Imaginary girl -Prequel
description:
The main character's name is "boy," and he is about 15 years old.
The story takes place in Valley Street, a dark city where it never gets dark.
The "boy" lives in the space between buildings.

When the "boy" walks down an alley, a holograph appears and the "girl" invites him to a trip to a southern island.
The "boy" takes a part-time job to earn a little money to access the island.
This is a communication game where you can make contact with the "girl" through the screen.

The finger-tip communication is done through the holographic screen,
This is an approach that has never been used in games before,
The "boy" and "girl" can draw together.
This may be the first attempt of its kind in the game world.


Can the "boy" get along with the "girl"?
And will he be able to go to the southern island where "girl" lives?


Main features
Can be played with keyboard, mouse or controller.
The actions include "run", "walk", "jump", etc. Just press the buttons according to the situation.
During the game, you can draw with GIRL.
Drawing is very difficult with a controller, so use the mouse.

The story continues in "Imaginary girl -Sequel".
This game consists of two parts.
